dcterms:creator: Vassil Panayotov

dcterms:description: A corpus of read speech data, widely used for automatic speech recognition (ASR) tasks. It contains 960 hours of training data and multiple test sets including dev-clean, dev-other, test-clean, and test-other.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech
